Articles.Content:
Kinda switching the format up a little on my videos. More fun to watch in any case.

The thread with the entire series's is here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/26400-YouTube-Re-launching-the-Laythe-Interplanetary-Ferry

Some questions...

Why you dont use the crew transfer plugin? XD

What mod is the one that give you a docking camera? I only know lazor, but I remove it becoz it destroy the Launch Stability Enhancer

And last.. How do you put those strut conectors after you docking?

He's more than likely using the Docking Struts mod. I have seen it before and basically it's parts you can add to two ships, and once their docked you can turn them on to make a physical Strut between them. I prefer using the Quantum Struts mod myself. the blue laser lights look better IMHO.

They are Strut Guns from the Quantum Struts pack. It IS lazor docking cam, and sorry, while I recorded this I was commentating but decided to go the musical route instead! I have the crew roster mod installed but I wanted to make this one look a little better
